summary.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account expires.

value.span: 一个，用于指定日期和时间的帐户过期或 null 如果帐户永远不会过期。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account expires, or null if the account never expires.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与所有一样中的属性，返回的时间采用 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要将其转换为本地时间，请调用方法返回的对象。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object. 当您将设置，时间将默认为 UTC。When you set the , the time will default to UTC. 如果你想要在本地时间中编写，则指定属性的你对象作为。If you want to write in local time, then specify the property of your object as .

exception.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AccountLockoutTime As Nullable(Of DateTime)
public: property Nullable<DateTime> AccountLockoutTime { Nullable<DateTime> get(); };

summary.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

span.span: Gets the Nullable that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out.

value.span: 一个如果没有锁定时间设置的帐户上指定日期和时间，该帐户已被锁定或为 null。

span.span: A that specifies the date and time that the account was locked out, or null if no lockout time is set on the account.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帐户锁定时间取决于系统，并且不能通过帐户管理 API 进行设置。The account lockout time is system dependent, and cannot be set by the Account Management API. 若要解锁帐户，请使用方法。To unlock the account, use the method. 可以帐户可能不会锁定时返回非 null 值。It is possible that an account may not be locked out when the returns a non-null value. 应用程序应使用方法来确定帐户是否已锁定。Applications should use the method to determine whether the account is locked out. 与所有一样中的属性，返回的时间采用 UTC 格式。As with all properties in , the time returned is in UTC form. 若要将其转换为本地时间，请调用方法返回的对象。To convert it to local time, call the method on the return object.

exception.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Enabled As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> Enabled { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };
member this.Enabled : Nullable<bool> with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

span.span: Gets or sets a Nullable Boolean value that specifies whether this account is enabled for authentication.

value.span: 如果主体是已启用，或者，如果帐户未持久化;否则为。

span.span: if the principal is enabled, or null if the account has not been persisted; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不将该主体保持在存储区中，此属性返回 null。If the principal has not been persisted in the store, this property returns null. 持久化主体后，启用的默认设置取决于存储区。After the principal is persisted, the default enabled setting depends on the store. 在 AD DS 和 AD LDS 存储禁用新的主体时保存，而 SAM 时它们将始终启用新的主体。The AD DS and AD LDS stores disable new principals when they are persisted, whereas SAM enables new principals when they are persisted. 应用程序只能设置此属性的值后已保留在存储中。The application can only set this property to a value after it has been persisted in the store.

exception.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

span.span: The underlying store does not support this property.

exception.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

span.span: The application tried to set a null value for this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法来强制用户在下次登录时更改密码。Call this method to force the user to change the password at the next logon.
